game.name: Stickman Shooter
game.description:
Some stickmen with wrong mind-set have planned to invade your base, and you have no other option rather than fighting against them. Grab your gun and ask your soldiers get ready to participate in the battle like never before in Stickman Shooter! Your enemies are big in number. Kill all of them including stickman zombie, a million metal SWAT enemy, and a thousand stickmen hunter. Click or tap the screen to destroy all of your enemies in this worldwide popular stickman war!
It is up to you to save your base against some cruel stickmen! Your enemies will come to you in different waves. Killing them will give you some money every time. Make sure to collect the enough money to enjoy the cold blood upgrade of your weapons arsenal. The best part is that you would have 10 unique and challenging levels to test your quick reaction and war skills. You do not need to run anywhere, or become a gun shooter, a gunner or a snipper to perform your task in this cool online tower defense game. 
Be careful and try to be alert all the time to protect your base against the sudden attacks of stickman shooters, tanks and more! Shoot down your enemy stick figures with your heavy machine gun and do not forget to reload it if you run out of ammo! Your mission is to kill all the attackers before they enter your base. Kill as many enemies as you can to earn the enough points to upgrade your special attacks along with the defense! Good luck to defend your base against all the enemy waves in this HTML5 shooting game!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Stickman Shooter at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!
